mapper.insert: insert into member(userid , passwd , username , nickname , post , addr1 , addr2 , phone1 , phone2) values(#{userid} , #{passwd} , #{username} , #{nickname} , #{post} , #{addr1} , #{addr2} , #{phone1} , #{phone2})
mapper.select: select userid,passwd,username,nickname,post,addr1,addr2, phone1,phone2 from member where userid =#{userid} and passwd=#{passwd}
